channel.title: Received $3,000 in credit from Google Cloud
channel.description:
As a founder of AXSAR Solo, I participated in Y-Combinator Startup School for over 9 weeks.
Apart from being a great program, they also lined up several good deals from big companies for the participating startups.
When it finished last week, I applied for the Google Cloud credits.
Today, I got the below email from Google Cloud:
"Welcome to the Google Cloud Startup Program!
We're pleased to offer your company $3,000 in Start Google Cloud Platform Credits, which can be used for any core GCP product, plus Firebase. "
I would highly recommend Y-Combinator Startup School, so do try to join it next year!
PS: AXSAR Solo is a CRM, and all-in-one workspace for small teams.

item.title: Received $3,000 in credit from Google Cloud
item.dc:creator: Michal_Mazurek
item.description:
It’s worth noting that you can’t just sign up to Startup School, you have to enroll in a course. Seems silly, but unless you enroll in a course you won’t get these benefits and won’t be able to post on their forum.

Read full topic
item.source: Received $3,000 in credit from Google Cloud
